content: पुरुषायित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Acting like a man. --तं {@--1@} Playing the man, acting a manly part, a manly conduct. {@--2@} A kind of coitus or mode of sexual enjoyment in which the woman plays the man; आकृतिमवलोक्य कयापि वितर्कितं पुरुषायितं असिलतालेखनेन वैदग्ध्यादभिव्यक्तिमुपनीतम् <ls>K. P. 10.</ls>
